articles.author: Luke Leitch
articles.title: Alessandro Michele is the new creative director of Valentino - Vogue Business
articles.description: The appointment ends 14 months of speculation about where Alessandro Michele would resurface following his exit from Gucci.
articles.content: From Tuesday, Michele will embark upon a total immersion within the archive and codes of his new home. He said: My first thought goes to this story: to the richness of its cultural and symbolic herit… [+3232 chars]
